name: df-relexp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(crelexp, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cn0, cif(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmpo(s2, s3, universe, universe, ccom(cv(s2), cv(s0))), cmpt(s4, universe, cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
comment: Definition of repeated composition of a relation with itself, aka relation exponentiation. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 22-May-2020.)
